ingredients.content: 350 g pasta, eg. Amori or Penne
1 lemon, thin peelings of skin, plus juice from ½ lemon
350 g courgettes, cut in pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Place water, 1 tsp salt and oil in mixing bowl then bring to the boil <b>9 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.
Add pasta and cook <b>select time according to packet instructions/100°C//speed <b>. Using simmering basket, drain pasta well under cold running water then set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place lemon rind in mixing bowl and chop <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add courgettes and chop <b>4 sec/speed 4<b> then scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add cream, ¼ tsp salt and pepper then heat <b>4 min/90°C//speed 1<b>.
Add cooked pasta and heat <b>6 min/98°C//speed 1<b>.
Add salmon, chopped chives and 15 g lemon juice then stir in using spatula. Serve immediately.
